panels.title: Execution rate on orchestrator and scheduler

targets.expr: label_join(max by (agent, mode) (sum by (pod, agent, mode) (application_uno_aiagent_conversations_monthly_number{namespace="$Namespace", release=~"$Release", pod=~"$pod"})), "composite_key", "-", "agent", "mode")

label_join(max by (agent, mode) (sum by (pod, agent, mode) (application_uno_aiagent_errors_monthly_number{namespace="$Namespace", release=~"$Release", pod=~"$pod"})), "composite_key", "-", "agent", "mode")

label_join(max by (agent, mode) (sum by (pod, agent, mode) (application_uno_aiagent_tool_errors_monthly_number{namespace="$Namespace", release=~"$Release", pod=~"$pod"})), "composite_key", "-", "agent", "mode")

label_join(max by (agent, mode) (sum by (pod, agent, mode) (application_uno_aiagent_invoke_monthly_number{namespace="$Namespace", release=~"$Release", pod=~"$pod"}) / sum by (pod, agent, mode) (application_uno_aiagent_conversations_monthly_number{namespace="$Namespace", release=~"$Release", pod=~"$pod"})), "composite_key", "-", "agent", "mode")

label_join(max by (agent, mode) (sum by (pod, agent, mode) (application_uno_aiagent_genaicalls_monthly_number{namespace="$Namespace", release=~"$Release", pod=~"$pod"}) / sum by (pod, agent, mode) (application_uno_aiagent_conversations_monthly_number{namespace="$Namespace", release=~"$Release", pod=~"$pod"})), "composite_key", "-", "agent", "mode")

label_join(max by (agent, mode) (sum by (pod, agent, mode) (application_uno_aiagent_tool_calls_monthly_number{namespace="$Namespace", release=~"$Release", pod=~"$pod"}) / sum by (pod, agent, mode) (application_uno_aiagent_conversations_monthly_number{namespace="$Namespace", release=~"$Release", pod=~"$pod"})), "composite_key", "-", "agent", "mode")

label_join(max by (agent, mode) (sum by (pod, agent, mode) (application_uno_aiagent_response_time_monthly_milliseconds{namespace="$Namespace", release=~"$Release", pod=~"$pod"}) / sum by (pod, agent, mode) (application_uno_aiagent_invoke_monthly_number{namespace="$Namespace", release=~"$Release", pod=~"$pod"})), "composite_key", "-", "agent", "mode")

label_join(max by (agent, mode) (sum by (pod, agent, mode) (application_uno_aiagent_tool_duration_monthly_milliseconds{namespace="$Namespace", release=~"$Release", pod=~"$pod"}) / sum by (pod, agent, mode) (application_uno_aiagent_tool_calls_monthly_number{namespace="$Namespace", release=~"$Release", pod=~"$pod"})), "composite_key", "-", "agent", "mode")

label_join(max by (agent, mode, workflow, service_name) (sum by (pod, agent, mode, workflow, service_name) (application_uno_aiagent_tool_calls_monthly_number{namespace="$Namespace", release=~"$Release", pod=~"$pod"})), "composite_key", "-", "agent", "mode", "workflow", "service_name")

label_join(max by (agent, mode, workflow, service_name) (sum by (pod, agent, mode, workflow, service_name) (application_uno_aiagent_tool_errors_monthly_number{namespace="$Namespace", release=~"$Release", pod=~"$pod"})), "composite_key", "-", "agent", "mode", "workflow", "service_name")

label_join(avg by (agent, mode, workflow, service_name) (sum by (pod, agent, mode, workflow, service_name) (application_uno_aiagent_tool_duration_monthly_milliseconds{namespace="$Namespace", release=~"$Release", pod=~"$pod"}) / sum by (pod, agent, mode, workflow, service_name) (application_uno_aiagent_tool_calls_monthly_number{namespace="$Namespace", release=~"$Release", pod=~"$pod"})), "composite_key", "-", "agent", "mode", "workflow", "service_name")

targets.expr: sum by(namespace, pod) (kube_pod_container_resource_limits{resource="memory", namespace=~"$Namespace", pod=~"$pod", container!=""})

sum by(namespace, pod, container) (kube_pod_container_resource_limits{resource="memory", namespace=~"$Namespace", pod=~"$pod", container!=""}) - on(pod, namespace, container) sum(container_memory_usage_bytes{namespace=~"$Namespace", pod=~"[[pod]]", container!=""}) by (namespace, pod, container)
sum by(namespace, pod) (kube_pod_container_resource_limits{resource="memory", namespace=~"$Namespace", pod=~"$pod", container!=""})
